title: Members of Congress seek increase in Mars Sample Return funding
summary: Members of Congress are asking NASA not to slow down work on the Mars Sample Return (MSR) program now while also lobbying fellow members to provide more money for the effort in 2024.

title: NASA Uses Two Worlds to Test Future Mars Helicopter Designs
summary: Engineers will go beyond the ends of the Earth to find more performance for future Mars helicopters.

title: Beyond Gravity Unveils Reusable Fairing Concept
summary:
Zurich-based Beyond Gravity has announced a reusable fairing concept that would be recovered along with the first stage of a rocket. Traditional fairings are created in two halves and cover the rocket’s payload bay. Once in space, the two fairing halves spit off, and the rocket’s second stage continues onward to deploy the payload. At […]
The post Beyond Gravity Unveils Reusable Fairing Concept appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Daily Telescope: The Milky Way soars above Devil’s Kitchen
summary: "Along this loop is a set of red rock hoodoos that pop out of seemingly nowhere."

title: NASA acknowledges possibility of short-term post-ISS gap
summary: While NASA seeks to maintain an uninterrupted human presence in low Earth orbit, an agency official said a short-term gap between the International Space Station and commercial successors would not be “the end of the world.”
